body:
I'm officialy quiting minecraft for good....
I will not be active on any social media, forums, or anything to do with minecraft.

I realized I need to move on with my life and forget about some block game that took away all my time and I didn't save time for anything else..

So with that said I'm gonna thank some people before I go and those people are


MLGPorky:

You were like my first ever actual online friend from avicus <3 You have helped me a lot and have inspired me to push myself to my limit an pursue my goals. I will never forget all the fun times we had together.


Eako:

I know we don't talk much but when we did you always helped me out. You have helped me with problems including Avicus which meant a lot to me because it seemed that no staff member on Avicus liked me at all.


Rilo:

When we first met on Avicus we absolutely hated each other but once we first skyped we became good friends even though we have our ups and downs and half the time I'm yelling at you we were good friends none the least.

Vlad:

Again same thing as porky, you were one of my first Avicus friends. You have been there for me when I have been down or something traumatic happened to me.

There are many more people that I would like to thank but I'll just list there name so they know who they are <3

Jracer
Tobin
Nova
NathBrown
Javi
Pizza
Zero
Iron
Dawning

Goodbye everyone :( I'll remember all of you <3

(Skype has already been deleted and I will leave the forums at 2:00 AST)

title: GoodBye Forever....... :(

replies.body:
See ya!

Have fun in the real life :P

replies.body: Good bye! Have fun in life. :(

replies.body: Goodbye, and good luck in life! :(
